name: SpongeBob: Krusty Cook-Off - Extra Krusty Edition
summary: The Nintendo Switch Exclusive "Extra Krusty Edition" of SpongeBob: Krusty Cook-Off is here! We've completely re-designed the game for Nintendo Switch bringing you all of the fun of the original with none of the grind! Access tons of free decorative items, costumes, kitchen gear and more, experience unlimited play and unleash four brand-new, Nintendo Switch exclusive power-ups to help you show off your skill behind the grill!
